name: I HAVE A DREAM
description:
I HAVE A DREAM is a 3D action game with puzzle elements.

Prologue:

You definitely feel like you were sleeping.
When I open my eyes, I feel like I'm trapped somewhere.
I think we'd better get out of here.

You will continue to challenge until you clear the dungeon.
After a few challenges, you will know how to move forward.

Key Features:

- Game progression using various point of view transformation
- Tutorial stage where you can practice point-in-time conversion and manipulation
- Solve puzzles using point-in-time transformations to challenge the boss
- Challenge bosses using different patterns to get to the next stage
